title: Sick of people demoralizing other players and especially me
body: Is there a way i can report someone? I will not put the names here. I was in a ranked game and 2 people were very toxic to me because they were friends. I reported them in game and I feel like nothing will be done. Is there a way I can get my chat logs for my game? I do not record, so I think it will be hard. I am sick of getting flamed at for no reason at all and I was not even the worst person "feeding" on my team. I don't flame others anyway as I am graceful in defeat and give constructive criticism. But I feel very upset as this happens alot and nothing gets done with these players. I need help punishing these players so that when I come across more. I can do what is right for myself and for the community and that is to make league a happy and enjoyable experience. Thanks

replies.body:
I have had many of these games, premades who refuse to help anyone but themselves and when you say something, they just turn on you and leave you, than blame you for playing bad. Even to the point I get better stats than all my team, but because I keep going 'alone', it is my fault (not the fact they leave me to die when the team fight starts just to have someone to blame).

Nothing really you can do, but what I will say is this, it is worse this season than all other season combined.

The sad thing is that the more you report people the less your reports are valued, on one account I would report often of people that were actively abusive and toxic, like atleast 1 of every 3 games, and I never once got the the notification that someone was punished. After reporting someone on my other account that I rarely play, (so few reports) the first report I did instantly got the notification that they were punished. It's not coincidence, I've heard numerous that reports have a devalue.
I though't that it was only if you do a false report. But all good, I will stick to muting them for now.

> I see what you mean,
>   
>  From your point of view; you're rarely told if anyone you report has been banned, and you keep encountering these toxic players in your games. 
> 
> With only this perspective, it's logical to believe that nothing is being done. I could go on and tell you that [Instant Feedback](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286-Instant-Feedback-System-FAQ-) is one of **Riot**'s best performing report systems ever, but it wouldn't actually help. 

_What you're looking for is **report feedback.**_

+ We do have a small [report feedback notification](http://pbs.twimg.com/media/CFN-7pWWYAAMdnX.png) right now, but people hardly see it because it only triggers in very specific situations. It's not really working properly and it's not enough TBH.

+ The Player Behaviour team has been looking looking into a solution since late last year. **Lyte** wanted to get better report feedback into the new tribunal, and that idea has stuck around. The old tribunal had some pretty good [feedback](http://cdn2-b.examiner.com/sites/default/files/styles/image_content_width/hash/ac/45/1362433030_6392_score.png) already, but the goal is to expand on that even more.

With the new tribunal being worked on right now, we'll hopefully see these features coming very soon.

I know it's hard, but try hang tight until then! :)

Yes, your logic is correct. That is the only assumption for that logic. So can't be wrong there and I agree with it. I do report the toxic players in game and they are true reports. But I get no notification as to if they have been punished. Thanks for your feedback! I shall try. :)
